video.title: The Five Ws of Atomic Design
video.description:
This talk introduces the basic concepts of atomic design and will help you understand and know more about who invented it, what atomic design is, where and when it should be implemented and why.

Talk by Riccardo Erra at the JS Roundabout meetup.

Recorded by Pusher.com. Check them out if you want awesome real-time tools, and subscribe to the their YouTube channel for more talks!

Pusher's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoyqucxoFXDFnh3khD0rjUg
